body: Perfect serving for my little dog I'm surprised at the bad reviews.  My dog got sick from the arthritis pain killer he was taking and I thought he was going to die as he stopped eating and had tarry stools.I gave him rice gruel with homemade chicken broth and pieces of chicken to clear his system of the medication. His appetite came back after 3 days and I decided to try this assortment as he wouldn't touch his regular dog food and the small portions were perfect. He began eating again and he enjoys this food. His digestive system is back to normal and his poops are normal.

body: Food Topper Finicky FurBaby My 60lb Rescue Mix gets picky and finicky sometimes and doesn't want to eat the norm. So after buying multiple crumble type food toppers and some other similar food additives I gave up. I figured when she got hungry she'd eat as usually she eats with no problem. A friend of mine had a Rescue with similar type issues and found the Beneful Small Breed Wet Food was the perfect thing. Beneful doesnt overload with additional calories that aren't needed in combination with choice of regular food as its intended for small breeds. Plus it wets the dry food just enough to give it some extra or additional texture and worked well for her pup. So I bought this item and did the same.I look at it like this....everyday my FurBaby eats (for example) Chicken and Veggies and she loves it, absolute fave. But sometimes she wants a little gravy with her chicken veggie meal just to spice things up lol. She appears to enjoy the different Purina Beneful Small Breed Flavors and only eats it once ot twice a week. At that frequency and the price point on Amazon I can afford to indulge her and she's happy. Her other favorite is her dry food with coconut oil or natural salmon oil. She let's me know which one she's in the mood for as she'll get the bottle off the shelf or bring me the small Benefit can lol. No digestive issues or changes in other such things. 🙂

body: Made my poor pup sick! I had been getting this exact same item from Walmart, and it caused no digestive issues and he loved it. Our Walmart doesn't always have it in stock though  So I ordered 2 cases from Amazon. As soon as we finished the case from Walmart and fed him from one of the Amazon packages, he started having loose stools. He was on an antibiotic after surgery at the time, so we chalked it up to that, since the exact same food had never bothered him before. But several days after he finished his course of antibiotics, his digestive system was still upset, and he didn't seem as thrilled to get his canned meal. After reading other reviews that mentioned similar issues, I immediately stopped giving him the cans from Amazon, and his digestive issues cleared right up. I don't know if there's something wrong with the storage of the product at Amazon that is causing the problem or what, but I'm returning the unopened case and buying his food elsewhere.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Our 2 fur babies liked all 3 flavors. Our 2 young adult Chihuahua-mix dogs couldn't have enough of this wet dog food. Made of quality ingredients that look good to eat. But these are tiny 3 ounce cans so I had to feed each dog 2 cans mixed with enough dry kibble for each meal.Our dogs really liked all 3 flavors. And all the tiny cans in the package were all gone in a couple of days. Our 2 Chihuahua-mixes are not the smaller sized dogs so I don't think I can afford to feed them more of this particular product because we need to be practical with our financial resources. Especially now that we just rescued a third adult dog very recently.

body: DO NOT BUY! ****Do Not Buy!!! After about a year of feeding this to my dog, I’m now seeing all the horrible reviews. Dogs having severe diarrhea & vomiting. I kept wondering why my baby would all of a sudden develop these symptoms & wouldn’t eat his food for days. I’ve thrown away several beds & blankets. I’m so angry at myself. I chalked it up to his pancreatitis acting up & to old age. Then I began researching the product & found horror stories of dogs going into renal failure over this food!!! 😡😡😡. I hope I save your baby from this. Do Not Buy!!!!  Now I’m in mad search of a healthy food for my 15 yr old Yorkie.

body: One happy puppy! Our girl loves this canned food! So much so, she immediately "sits" and licks her lips when I touch one, lol. Our pup is a social eater, meaning she only won't eat unless other people are in the room eating too. Our vet noted she is a little on the skinny side and suggested that I try mixing some wet food into her dry kibble in the mornings to encourage her to eat. And holy cow, is it working! I only need to stir in 1/3 of a can to get her to her attention (and these are small cans). Now she'll return to the dish usually around 10:00 a.m. and again at noon just to see if she got more... And since she's there, she decides to take a few nibbles! Yay!The product itself is great. I love that I can pronounce everything that is listed on the label and it smells like human food.  Purina is a brand I certainly trust, so I am extra happy with these. I can't recommend this wet food or this brand enough!
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Picky eater? Well I have many different types of animals I always learned that every one of them has a unique pallet. Though I'm starting to think it's just because I and my significant other spoil our animals. Our little one has a very picky eating habit and prefers fresh or actual food that has shape and identifiable of what it is..or in some cases what It was. When you open this convient package it is resealable with a lid keeping in the freshness. You can see actual carrots and peas. The appearance of the food shows that quality ingredients were used compared to conventional can food with its gelatin held shape. The variety of flavor options keeps me and my pup happy.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Great add in for medium and large dogs too Our dogs loved these! Even though we have medium-large dogs, we used this as an "add-in" with their normal kibble and they really liked the flavor.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Smells so yummy! This is the very 1st pate my Doberman ever tried. I know it says for small dogs but I needed something small to bring with me when we go hiking. I mix this with his Purina dry food and he loves it. What I love about this is it comes in a easy to open can and the smells is so yummy, I can also see the vegetables mix in it. I have to say it smells better than my own cooking haha. My dog knows the smell so well that he looks forward to his meal break after a long walk. I also pack this in our van in case we go for long walks.Will definitely buy again
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Topper for senior dogs These are little cat food sized cans. The pate is a soft texture that's easy to mix with dry food and water. Our senior dogs like it because it's easy to chew and digest. The old dames haven't shown any digestive upset with this.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Pups love this * review of 12-pack *We have been using one can a day as a kibble addition, to the great satisfaction of our two puppies. We use a quarter-can at breakfast and dinner, and stir to mix with the kibble. The pate texture works well for this, whether it is room temperature or out of the fridge.We have noticed no odd effects, such as gas or a change in consistency in yard “deposits,” so this meets our needs. Budget-wise it would not be sustainable for us as a sole source of nutrition. From previous hurricane seasons, I do like to keep small shelf-stable servings of moist food on hand for our pets to help ensure they are taking in enough fluid.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Beef and salmon top flavors This dog food comes in a fairly small can. It’s only 3 ounces. I would compare it to the size of a baby food jar. Being the first time my dog has tried this food, I appreciate smaller portions anyway.The salmon, tomatoes, carrots, and spinach blend does have a slight fishy smell to it. It has good gravy content and gelatin. It’s a pate so the ingredients are not completely visible however the spinach specs can be seen as they are quite green against the brown food. My cat usually shows no interest in the dog food, but even this salmon one he did manage to muscle the pooch out of the way for a taste.The beef, tomatoes, carrots, and spinach blend is very similar to the salmon. There are more visible dark brown specs for the beef and again the spinach can be seen. It has a fairly beefy smell to it.The chicken, tomatoes, carrots, and spinach blend has the most neutral scent of all three. Again, it has the pate texture with visible green flecks for the spinach. It also has a fair amount of gelatin in it so it’s quite moist.Each can has the easy to lift pop tops. They are easy to use and I like to supplement my dogs dry food with them. I serve them on the side of his dry kibble as a side dish.Flavor wise, my dogs preference was the beef, the salmon, and finally the chicken. However he did like all of them and I just noticed a slight increase in how quick he ate each type. The chicken he seemed to be the most hesitant about. He sniffed it for a little while before consuming but then finally did. However also with the chicken he did lick the bowl clean like he did the fish and beef.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Wet Dog Food This food has a purée consistency. There are a few speckles of larger chunks of what looks like vegetables, but in general, it is a mushy consistency similar to most wet dog foods. It looks exactly like the image on the package.It is softer than my dogs’ regular food, which I use a fork to mush. I mixed this in some of their regular food, to acclimate them to it and hopefully avoid any digestive issues, and it is much softer to mush. I don’t think it’s necessary to mush this food at all because of the softness making it easy for my dogs to eat it without biting off chunks at a time.While my dogs are always excited to eat, they seem impressed with this food. They eat it much faster. That may be because it’s softer so easier to eat, but they also seem to really like it.They have been eating it for several days with no negative effects. They are very excited when they see the can.The portion size is noticeably smaller than the regular 3.5 oz square cans they normally eat.My dogs are currently both around 18 lbs, but one of them is predisposed to obesity, so I’m very careful about adding anything to her diet because it’s such a struggle to maintain her healthy weight. This food is high in protein and contains real meat and vegetables, so I feel comfortable adding this, especially since she likes it so much.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Dogs loved it! The dogs loved this food. IT is good for small dogs, good portions. Both dogs ate it right up. I've given them each flavor and I would say the Beef was their favorite!
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Great food This is very good stuff. Ingredients are great and my dogs absolutely love this as a topper for their dry food, or in their enrichment toys.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Great meal toppers My small, older dogs like these wet food cans. Good quality ingredients & comes in 3 flavor varieties (chicken, beef, and salmon)  as well as includes vitamins & minerals. I use these as meal toppers for their dry kibble since they are picky & want extras.Amazon will donate to your favorite charity! Use Amazon Smile (smile.amazon.com) when you order and Amazon will donate to the charity of your choice when you make a qualifying purchase. Check out how Amazon Smile works at https://smile.amazon.com/gp/chpf/about/ref=smi_se_rspo_laas_aas. My shopping is donating to my charity of choice; Unravel, at no cost to me! Unravel is a nonprofit organization working to spread knowledge about the grim realities of pediatric cancer and the devastating impact from the lack of funding. All monies raised by and for Unravel will go directly to the fight against pediatric cancer.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: Slurped Up! The pack arrived as expected with Salmon, Beef, and Chicken as the three flavors of Pate.The can was very easy to open with it being a pop-top and the food came out of the can very easily. In fact, the food came out of the can and remained intact as one "glob". My pup sat there patiently watching as I took some photos but I could tell that the smell was driving him crazy (in a good way). This dog food is on the stinkier side which my dog seems to love!He quickly went to slurping it down when I put the bowl down and he licked the bowl clean. I think my dog would give this 5 stars for taste. The ingredients seem to be "ok" (not the best but could be worse) BUT as my dog is a bit picky.. getting him to eat anything is always a win.One thing to note is that the feeding instructions suggest 1 can per 3.5-4.5lbs so this pack may be devoured quickly depending on your dog's weight!
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans

body: My friend’s two dogs devoured this; they love this selection I ordered this for my friend's two dogs. I know this is for small breeds but they love food like this.There are 12 three-ounce cans in this package of three different varieties with four cans of each kind.- Incredibites pate with beef, tomatoes, carrots, and spinach - chicken, chicken and beef broth, liver, meat-by-products, beef, tomatoes, carrots, spinach, etc.2- Incredibites pate with with real chicken, tomatoes, carrots, and spinach - chicken, liver, chicken broth, meat-by-products, tomatoes, carrots, spinach, etc.3- Incredibites pate with real salmon, tomatoes, carrots, and spinach - chicken, chicken and salmon broth, liver, meat-by-products, salmond, tomatoes, carrots, spinach, etc.My friend's dogs are spoiled and love to be hand fed. As can be seen in the photo, they are being hand fed this food. It was a hit.There is currently no price listed for this. I suspect this will be cost prohibitive for some. My ranking of five stars is for the ingredients and taste. I'll let the consumer judge if the price is right.
subject: Purina Beneful Small Breed Wet Dog Food Variety Pack, IncrediBites with Real Beef, Chicken or Salmon - (30) 3 oz. Cans
